message.body: haaaapy friiiiidayyyyy
thank god
this was the longest week EVER
ha. so hows the w/e shaping up? you getting together w/ the girls?
well we did dinner last night, so this weekend is just a random collection of things adam and i have to do.
what bout you, any good plans?
nothing solid yet. might go out tonight. I sorta asked divorcee/NYC out but havent heard back
haha
well see
what, did you think I was going to listen to you?
absolutely not
which is why i think its funny
the band have a gig tonight?
the way I see it there's a good chance one of em will bite. No gigs for them tonight but we might stop by a few places. You in?
mehh, i dont know. Im still recovering from two days of drinking and were doing dinner with the rents tonight.
plus, all my bills come out this week and ive been afraid to check the finances lol
well I don't think it's going to be like the other night, that got a little out of hand
and Im sure raf can spot ya, haha
ridiculous
and for the record, i severely regretted taking all that free alcohol yesterday at work. bad life decision.
free alcohol at work?
I didn't know thats how you all rolled
noooooo
referencing the night before
ah, right. Yeah it took awhile for me feel like a normal person. I did not expect things to go that way. I bought one round!
hahaha
its all good though. well Im getting out of here cause Ive got nothing to do and its friday. gimme a shout if you wanna hang later
